about_the_game:
Splort is an intense party game brawler featuring unique mechanics centered around physics-based movement and force-based combat. You and your friends will enjoy mastering its challenging yet fun mechanics—like wielding physics-based weapons and battling through tons of creative levels designed around these mechanics.

In Splort, you control your character using an elastic hand to climb, push, and handle various weapons. Your legs can move up and down to jump and stomp—but be cautious! Anything can kill you, crush your legs, or snap your head off if it hits you hard enough. With a huge variety of levels and weapons across five different game modes, every match offers a new opportunity to refine your skills and outplay your friends.

  • 2-12 Players! (Local Multiplayer Only) - Two players can use keyboard/mouse. Controllers recommended!

  • 170+ Levels, 50+ Weapons, 5 Game Modes

  • Team and Free-For-All Modes: Compete with or against your friends.

  • Easy to Learn, Challenging to Master Controls: You'll quickly get started, but expect to stumble around clumsily the first times you play!

  • Physics-Based Combat: Stomp, stab, shoot, or squish your friends with enough force to take them out. Use the environment to your advantage—and avoid falling victim to it yourself.

So grab your friends, grab your controllers, and get ready to Splort!
